participant_1.background:
I met a lot of new people at the welding classes I've been taking.
I start my day with a fresh mango and stretching my long legs.
My health is my best asset.
i am a mother of two.
i like to play video games.

participant_2.background:
I'm close to my family and enjoy reading and spending time at the beach.
i live in texas.
i cannot go a single day without eating ice cream.
i speak fluent german.
i love to surf.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Doing well, thanks for asking! I'm enjoying a nice day at the beach.
That sounds lovely! I'm a bit jealous. I'm stuck inside working on a welding project.
Welding? That sounds really cool! What are you working on?
I'm working on a new table for my living room. I'm trying to teach myself how to weld, so it's a bit of a challenge.
That's awesome! I'm sure it will turn out great. I'm impressed that you're teaching yourself how to weld.
Thanks! It's been a lot of fun, but it's also been a lot of work.
I'm sure it will be worth it when you're done.
I hope so!
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to play video games, read, and spend time with my family.
That sounds great! I like to read and spend time at the beach with my family.
What are some of your favorite books?
I love to read all kinds of books, but I'm especially a fan of historical fiction and romance novels.
Me too! I love historical fiction. I'm currently reading a book about the American Revolution.
That sounds really interesting! I love learning about history.
Me too! I'm a huge history buff.
It sounds like we have a lot in common!
Yeah, it does! We should get together sometime and talk about books.
That would be great! I'd love to meet you.
Me too! I'll send you a message later and we can figure out a time to get together.
Sounds good
